title: State v. Terrance Lewis – Addendum 3 – Criminal Injustice
content:encoded:
January 18, 2018 / Addendum host Jon Cryer, along with Colin Miller and guest panelist David Harris (@dharrislawprof) of the Criminal Justice Podcast discuss Episode 3 of the Terrance Lewis Case.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.
